title: Bitcoin Supply on Exchanges Slides to Three-Year Low
description: Supply is likely dropping as traders and investors increasingly choose to self custody bitcoin holdings amid regulatory and exchange risks.

title: Australia's Crypto Industry Body Denounces Recent Banking Restrictions
description: Blockchain Australia said it wants to tackle the issue "head-on by using real data," after reports that banks in the country were blocking payments to crypto exchanges.

title: Crypto Exchange Thodex Founder Denies Fraud Charges in Turkey
description: The founder of failed cryptocurrency exchange Thodex has denied all fraud-related allegations in a Turkish court. The crypto entrepreneur was handed over to Turkey by Albanian authorities earlier this year to face charges for his leading role in running the now defunct platform. title: Amazon Web Services (AWS) outage temporarily disrupts services, Ethereum network remains resilient
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS), the leading cloud service provider, experienced a brief but notable outage on June 13, causing service disruptions for numerous organizations. While the incident impacted major news organizations and websites, the Ethereum network remained resilient, unaffected by the disruption despite its heavy reliance on AWS for hosting its infrastructure. title: Cardano Price Prediction 2023-2032: Is ADA a good investment?

title: US Treasury secretary believes CBDCs should be confidential
description: In a recent speech, Assistant Secretary Graham Steele unveils the transformative potential of retail CBDCs in the digitization of financial services.

title: BREAKING: Judge Rules in Favor of Binance US, No Asset Freeze Imposed in SEC Case

title: Blockchain Net Zero set to be the Colombia’s largest Web 3.0 event with over 5000 attendees and 300+ companies
